name: TPP's Bad Fucking Day
description:
Storyline:

One peaceful day... TPP was walking around town

But then he thought: "I wonder if my money got stolen"

So then he went back to his safe. And he lost all his money

Now he's on a rampage to kill everyone until he finds his money

Instructions:

Controls:

Keyboard:

A = Move Left

D = Move Right

Space = Jump

Move Mouse = Aim Gun

Left Click = Shoot Gun

XBOX Controller:

Left Analog Stick: Move left and right

Right Analog Stick: Aim Gun

A or B or RT = Jump

X or Y or LT = Shoot Gun

Nintendo Switch Joycons or Pro Controller:

Left Analog Stick: Move left and right

Right Analog Stick: Aim Gun

B or A or RT = Jump

Y or X or LT = Shoot Gun

Note: if the game gets stuck in a room, press / to restart the level

Q/A:

Q: What Is this Game?

Answer: This is a free bad platformer game

Q: What does the TPP in the title mean?

Answer: It means The Plush Productions

Q: Why did you make the game?

Answer: It was for a person I met on discord called The Plush Productions (TPP). I do not know who this person is, he's one of my friend's friend.

Q: Why is the main character sprite Conker?

Answer: Because TPP said he was "The Real Conker". And I have no idea why.

Q: Is this a Sequel to Conkers Bad Fur Day?

Answer: No.

(C) Ayanbadin Inc 2022
